document_data.name: Kazrith
document_data.mainbody: A '''Kazrith''' was an aquatic [[demon]] that could be found prowling murky lakes, underground waterways, and flooded tunnels.
document_data.Abilities: A kazrith used [[tremorsense]] to detect enemies; after locating a target, it surfaced and attacked, [[poison|poisoning]] its victim. The demon waited until the prey was weak from the poison, then resurfaced and finished it off. This demon was also a skilled burrower, using the [[acid]] in its pores to excrete a trail of acid in the tunnels it made.

Ecology.Society: These demons were often found in groups or in the company of other sinister aquatic monsters.
